#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long arr[21];
int n;
void solve(){
    arr[0]=1;
    for(int i=1; i<21; i++){
        arr[i]=arr[i-1]*i;
    }
}
unsigned long long int derr(){
    unsigned long long int ans=0;
    for(int i=2; i<=n; i++){
        unsigned long long int temp=0;
        temp=arr[n]/arr[i];
        if(i%2==0) ans=ans+temp;
        else ans=ans-temp;
    }
    return ans;
}
int main(){
    solve();
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        unsigned long long int k=derr();
        cout<<k<<endl;
          //  cout<<arr[i]<<endl;
        }
    
}
